meanings.definition: A type of mushroom with a thick stem and cap.
meanings.sent1: I found some boletes growing in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The boletes were delicious when cooked in a stew.
meanings.sent3: Why did the boletes go to the party? Because they were fungi to be around!
meanings.sent4: The boletes stood tall in the woods like little umbrellas.
meanings.sent5: The earthy smell of the boletes filled the kitchen as they simmered in the pot.

meanings.definition: The plural form of bolete, referring to multiple mushrooms of this type.
meanings.sent1: We gathered a basket full of boletes from the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The market had a variety of boletes for sale.
meanings.sent3: The boletes threw a party to celebrate their harvest!
meanings.sent4: The boletes in the field danced together like a colorful carpet.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared a flavorful dish using the assortment of boletes.
